org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.ui

Class PairBluetoothLeFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.ui.BluetoothDevicesFragment
        • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.ui.PairBluetoothLeFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, BluetoothDeviceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener

    public class PairBluetoothLeFragment
extends BluetoothDevicesFragment
    A fragment that handles the pairing to Bluetooth LE devices. An Activity using this fragment MUST implement the PairBluetoothLeFragment.OnPairDevice interface.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  PairBluetoothLeFragment.BluetoothGattConnectCallback
      Internal callback for handling new-device connections and disconnections.
      static interface  PairBluetoothLeFragment.OnPairDevice
      Interface to be implemented by the Activity in which this fragment runs.
